amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Ward amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, that prohibits the use of funds to be used to issue any tax compliance certificate of any individual departing the United States, unless a system is in place to collect taxes, (as prescribed in H.R. 1812).

action.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Archer to the Ward amendment (A010).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Archer amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 193 (Roll no. 533).
